segments.text: Hello , I'd like to see Mr . Charles , the manager , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don't make any prior appointment , do you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . I haven't , but I'll take only a few minutes of his time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please tell your name , company and the nature of your business .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . My name is Lin Tao , the director of Guangzhou Computer Corporation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Wait a minute , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( 2 minutes later ) Mr . Lin , Mr . Charles can see you now . This way , please .
segments.speaker: S1
